children: You can recycle up to 2 gallons of motor oil on each recycling collection day:
Pour cooled oil into a 1-gallon plastic container with a tight-fitting, screw-on lid.
Label the container with your name and address.
Set up to 2 labeled 1-gallon containers on the curb next to your recycling bin.
Apartment / Condo residents: Set out up to 2 labeled 1-gallon containers per cart at your building/complex.
Bring up to 5 gallons of oil per a trip to
Bring contaminated oil that contains solvents, bleach, or other materials to a
Motor oil can be recycled if it doesn’t contain solvents, bleach, or other materials.
Never pour motor oil on the ground or down the drain; it can pollute our waterways and the environment.
